dcterms:description: A dataset containing pairs of concepts and features (human associations), annotated with semantic relationships, used to extract hyponym-hypernym pairs for analyzing attention patterns in LLMs.

dcterms:creator: Christiane Fellbaum
dcterms:description: An electronic lexical database used to generate counterfactual noun pairs by extracting sister terms and hypernyms for analyzing attention patterns in LLMs.
dcterms:title: WordNet
